Known for his dazzling charm, rapier wit, and unrivaled humility, Michael is the creator of the Ruby on Rails Tutorial and principal author of the Learn Enough to Be Dangerous introductory sequence. Michael is also notorious as the founder of Tau Day and author of The Tau Manifesto, but rumors that he's secretly a supervillain are slightly exaggerated.

The Future

Hostel Review as the name goes is a hostel review website created with the intention of helping university students make the right choice when trying to pick a home where they intend to spend their university years.

we believe there are at least a bilion students who can benefit from living in a coducive environment, probably more. If you would like to extend the branch of Hostel Review – as we currently cover only Nnamdi Azikiwe University, Awka, Anambra State – feel free to email us.
